abstract: The dispatch queue that the system uses for callbacks.
overview:
## Discussion

Objects that conform to the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevicePhysicalInput] protocol dispatch callbacks on the device’s [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevice/handlerQueue] property by default. If you want to use a different dispatch queue, set this property to the preferred queue before you set callbacks.

# queue

**Instance Property**

The dispatch queue that the system uses for callbacks.

## Declaration

```swift
var queue: dispatch_queue_t? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Objects that conform to the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevicePhysicalInput] protocol dispatch callbacks on the device’s [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevice/handlerQueue] property by default. If you want to use a different dispatch queue, set this property to the preferred queue before you set callbacks.
title: queue
